New Records: Albania scored the fastest goal in Euros history
Key Match Events: Ferran Torres scored the winning goal for Spain in the 13th minute
Kristjan Asllani's powerful 25-yard strike for Albania was saved by Spain goalkeeper David Raya
Albania's substitute Armando Broja caused problems and pushed for a goal that would have seen them come third in the group
Pre-Game Insights: Spain had won all eight of their previous encounters with Albania
Spain coach Luis de la Fuente made 10 changes to his starting line-up due to already securing top spot in the group
Post-Match Reflections: Albania's Euro adventure ends after losing to Spain
Albania finished bottom of Group B and were eliminated from the competition
England, France, and the Netherlands secured last-16 places
Miscellaneous Highlights: Spain maintained their 100% record at Euro 2024
Spain will play their last-16 tie on Sunday in Cologne against a third-placed finisher from one of Group A, D, E, or F
